title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Van's RV7/RV7A - version 1.0.3
description:
In this video we are going to have a look at the Van's RV-7A which is a new type of Van's aircraft which has been released today. Earlier we looked at the RV-7 which is a single seater and now we have a two person aircraft version also. After shortly reviewing the exterior we start the engine for a short flight.

If you want to try the aircraft yourself please download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/23192/van-s-rv-7
